climate: Hot, dry climate with annual rainfall 500-750 mm; temperature 25-35°C.
soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil with good organic matter.
water_requirements: Moderate; drip irrigation preferred, avoid waterlogging.
fertilizer_requirements: FYM 10 kg/plant, N:P:K @ 500:200:200 g/plant/year split in three doses.
disease_management: Use Bhagawa/Arkta varieties; copper oxychloride sprays; maintain orchard sanitation.
market_demand: High export demand; major markets in Mumbai, Pune, Middle East.
source: Maharashtra State Horticulture & Medicinal Plant Board

soil_type: Fertile, well-drained sandy loam or clay loam.
fertilizer_requirements: FYM 25 t/ha; N:P:K @ 120:60:60 kg/ha split in 3 doses.
disease_management: Seed treatment with Trichoderma; proper drainage; copper fungicide sprays.
market_demand: High domestic and export demand; used in spices, pharma, cosmetics.

soil_type: Sandy loam to clay loam with good drainage.
disease_management: Neem oil sprays; sulfur dusting; maintain spacing.
market_demand: Strong demand from Ayurveda, essential oil, and herbal tea industries.
source: Maharashtra State Horticulture & Medicinal Plant Board
